Name: Elbow Deep in the Nearly Dead
Description: The Fading Haruspex has little time left. Nor does the [q:Gant Pole: Something Ends]. You pick up the ceremonial knife. She squeezes your other hand tight, whispering what little she can to guide you through the vivisection process. [Your skill in Haruspicy makes this challenge easier.]

DefaultEvent.Name: Secrets lost to zee and time
DefaultEvent.Description:
The Fading Haruspex's hand slips from yours. She falls to the bloody floor, the last of her energy spent. Her disciples hurry to move her away from the Old Zailors' feeding frenzy. One gently moistens her face one last time, to better close her cracked eyelids.

"Thank you for trying. We will take her home now. They will not complain. Not much. Not now that she will never answer another question. Please. She saw many secrets down here. They were of no use to her, sadly, but she would want someone to benefit from them."

ChildBranches.Name: The beast moans its last
ChildBranches.Description: A dry shuddering marks the end of both its life and pain.

DefaultEvent.Name: A final twist of the knife
DefaultEvent.Description:
One last scream. One last shudder. It is over. The beast's thrashing slows. Its anguished moan ends.

The Fading Haruspex's hand slips from yours, the last of her energy spent. Her disciples hurry to move her away from the Old Zailors' feeding frenzy. One gently moistens her face one last time, to better close her cracked eyelids over dry eyeballs.

ChildBranches.Name: End the beast's pain
ChildBranches.Description: There is nothing worth gaining from this cruelty.

ChildBranches.Name: In morte ultima veritas
ChildBranches.Description: The entrails on the Haruspex's small table finally form a coherent pattern. For a moment, you can see what she sees.

DefaultEvent.Name: A wasted cruelty
DefaultEvent.Description: Your knife slips, puncturing an organ. The [q:Gant Pole: Something Ends] moans and writhes, its pained shuddering throwing you down to the ground.

ChildBranches.Name: Cut the flesh
ChildBranches.Description: Reveal what lies inside. Carve the path.

DefaultEvent.Name: A mess of worthless meat
DefaultEvent.Description: No matter how you sort them, these are just sticky strings of useless flesh. The beast moans as you sever and discard them.

ChildBranches.Name: Sort the entrails
ChildBranches.Description: The Haruspex's slate is notched and marked, ready for them.

DefaultEvent.Name: Caverns of flesh
DefaultEvent.Description: A slip of the knife. The subdued roar of the nearly dead. You pat its hide with your hand, stroke it. Don't worry, you tell it. Soon it will be time to sleep.

ChildBranches.Name: Dig deeper
ChildBranches.Description: You have not yet reached the heart.

DefaultEvent.Name: An end still denied
DefaultEvent.Description: Your knife misses its target. The beast rocks, too exhausted to cry out again. It has little life left in it.

ChildBranches.Name: Pluck an organ
ChildBranches.Description: It will take careful timing to extract one safely.

DefaultEvent.Name: Still incoherent
DefaultEvent.Description: Blood, sweat, and tears drip from your fingers, forehead and eyes as you stare at the stone disk handed you by the Haruspex's disciples, willing the mess to make sense.

ChildBranches.Name: Search for patterns
ChildBranches.Description: What does the Haruspex see that even her disciples cannot?
